resources.string: - It is not possible to travel without an electronic ticket or Personalized BursaKart.
- It is not possible to get on and off public transport vehicles other than the stops.
- The button to get off is pressed before the stop, the button to get off at the last moment is not pressed.
- Children aged 0-6 can travel free of charge, provided that they are accompanied by their parents.
" - Behaviors that endanger human life cannot be performed."
- Litter cannot be thrown on public transport.
- In this case, legal action will be taken in accordance with the relevant articles of the Turkish Penal Code.

Formal Primary and High School students, Open Education Faculty students who have not completed the age of 27 (under the age of 28) and are not registered with the SGK, students who have not completed the age of 27 (under the age of 28) of universities within the scope of YÖK, and students who have not completed the age of 30 (less than 31 years old) and postgraduate and doctorate students who are not registered with the SGK, foreign students studying in our city, Open Primary and High School students who have not completed the age of 27 (under the age of 28) and are not registered with the SGK, and Article 11 of the Law No. 3308 It refers to the students of apprenticeship schools as required.
" A) Those Who Will Benefit From Discounted Travel Cards and Application Conditions"
" - 1 current passport-size photograph taken within the last 6 months"
-Primary and secondary school students studying in formal education institutions, T.R. Querying the ID Number
-Açık Primary and High School students, as per the protocol signed with the Ministry of National Education, T.R. Querying the Identity Number, document showing that it is not registered in SSI
-Student certificate of the relevant semester, obtained within the last month for University and High School students, (Student status must be active in the student certificate received.)

-Students who do not exceed the age of 27 (under the age of 28) of the Vocational Education Center, Maturation Institute and make-up programs must apply with the student certificates they have received within the last month.

- Students who have completed the 13th term in Open Education High School and Open Primary Education schools, and those who have completed their education in two-year departments of Anadolu University, and those who have completed their education in 4-year departments, exceeding 7 years, and students with a waiting period, and course students outside the official institution cannot benefit from the discount right.
-Teachers working in public and private, formal primary and secondary schools: TC inquiry in accordance with the MEB Protocol, (included in the e-municipality system)

- For the academic staff (Professor, Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, Lecturer, Research Assistant, Lecturer, Specialist Translator and Educational Planner) in Universities and High Schools, a valid job certificate and identity card with banderol
-Work Place Certificate, Personnel Movement Approval, copy of diploma and formation upon request for Paid Teachers, Master Trainers, Contracted Teachers working in public institutions
All protocols are made by Burulaş and sent to the system by the Head of the Information Processing Department.
- Defined by the Corporate Profit Implementation directive.
Those who complete the above documents apply to Burulaş.
" B) Those Who Will Benefit From Free Travel Cards and Application Conditions"

a) Veteran, Spouse, Mother and Father, Unmarried children under the age of 25, Wife of the Martyr Mother and Father, unmarried children under the age of 25 and National Athletes to whom Salary is Paid by the SGK Institution:
- Copy of ID card issued by the Ministry of Family and Social Policies or SGK Institution

-Press Card issued by the Prime Ministry General Directorate of Press and Broadcasting, a travel card that will provide free pass in case of applying to the Travel Cards Offices with your 1 current photo and ID is defined.
-They travel with an ID card issued by the General Directorate of Security, the Gendarmerie General Command, and the Coast Guard Command.
Documents Required when a personalized card is requested:
-They travel with the Police Identity Card issued by the municipalities.
- Approval given by the Police Department

1/1/2013 tarihinden geçerli olmak üzere, T.C. Posta ve Telgraf Teşkilatı Genel Müdürlüğü kadro ve pozisyonlarında bulunup, Büyükşehir Belediyeleri sınırları içeresinde dağıtıcı olarak görev yapanlara, belediye tarafından işletilen toplu taşıma araçları ile özel halk otobüslerinde ücretsiz yararlanmaları için anılan Genel Müdürlük tarafından verilen fotoğraflı kimlik kartı ile seyahat ederler.
-T.C. Posta ve Telgraf Teşkilatı Bölge Müdürlüğü tarafından verilen onay
- Approval letters received from the relevant District Governorates or the receipt of the last pension of the needy received from the PTT.
-Health board report and Disabled identity card documenting 40% or more disability from a full-fledged State Hospital
-Health board report from a full-fledged State Hospital certifying that she is 50% or more severely disabled (for a disabled companion)
C) Benefit and Application Conditions of Those Subjected to the Allowance Law
- The approved staff list and request letter of the personnel.
They apply to Burulaş with the above-mentioned documents and receive a free personalized travel card.
- Age 65+ (Receiving needy salary from the State with Law No. 2022)
- 65+ age free (based on the regulation of the Ministry of Family and Social Policies dated 04.03.2014)
- Subscription Discount 1 / Teacher and 60 years old / 160 Boarding
- Subscription Discount 2 / Teacher and Age 60 / 160 Boarding
Those traveling with a Discounted or Free Travel card are required to show their Personalized BursaCard to the drivers without being asked.
-For those who attempt to travel with someone else\'s or fake Personalized BursaKart, the driver takes the BursaCard and issues a report and delivers it to our directorate.
-You can get on the public transport vehicles from the front door, and get off at the middle and back doors.
- Disabled citizens, the elderly, pregnant women and women with children are accommodated. Priority is given for boarding and landing.
- It is not allowed to ride with any pets other than dogs accompanying the visually impaired and pets carried in cages with precautionary measures.
- Other passengers cannot be disturbed by sleeping or leaning.
- No more than the space reserved for one passenger (except for the disabled) can be occupied.
" - Litter cannot be thrown on public transport."
- It is not allowed to ride with large items, flammable, explosive, breakable, spillable and smelly substances that may cause discomfort and harm to the vehicle and other passengers.
" -No tools, seats, etc. in public transport. equipment cannot be damaged."
- While driving, the driver cannot be spoken to unless it is mandatory.
" Documents Required when a personalized card is requested:"
